detail.title: Frontend Developer Course
detail.label: CyberLearn.Vn Academy
content: Learn Programming Language through frontend projects using ReactJS, RESTful API, HTML, CSS, Javascript technologies - and related libraries of above mentioned Programming Language.
Basic training about Java, OOP, Github.

detail.title: Business Assitiant
detail.label: EVE FINE International Co.,Ltd.
content: Support and guide customers to choose Mitsubishi Electric products that fit with technical requirement.
Then, send customers the quotation. Make the procedures to take goods from warehouse and handover them to customers.

detail.title: Material Controller
detail.label: LILAMA Corp,.
content: Supervise and control in the taking equipments/materials process of LILAMA's subsidiaries at LILAMA warehouse and EPC contractor warehouse!

detail.title: Student
